name: Star Conflict - Into the unknown
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packages cannot be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This bundle includes
  • Owners of this bundle will get access to additional rewards in the first phase of the “Moon Race” — “Into the unknown”.
  • Early access to PvE “Temple of Last Hope”
  • 2000 Galactic Standards

In honour of the 2650th anniversary of the first landing on the satellite of the legendary Earth — the Moon, all pilots can participate in a special event — the “Moon Race”!

The event will take place over three phases. Each phase has 30 stages. Only the owners of a special bundle can unlock all stages. But the first and every fifth reward for the stages will be available to all pilots.

To get the reward, you need to unlock the desired stage. In order to gain access to the next reward, you need to go through all the previous stages. You can join a phase at any time when the phase is available.

Read more about the “Moon Race” on the official website of the project.

Galactic Standards is a special in-game currency that can be purchased with real money. With its help, your progress in the game will be easier and more comfortable.

short_description: This bundle includesOwners of this bundle will get access to additional rewards in the first phase of the “Moon Race” — “Into the unknown”.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz, Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 6 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 6 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Star Conflict - Into the unknown
